content.rendered:
Directed by Haneef Adeni.

Written by Haneef Adeni.

Cast Mammootty(David Nainan). Arya(Andrews Eapen). Sneha(Dr. Michelle David). Anikha Surendran(Sara David). Malavika Mohanan(Meera). Santhosh Keezhattoor(James). Kalabhavan Shajohn(Sathyadevan). Balaji Sarma(Jose). Mukundan(Ravi). Miya George(Dr. Susan Varghese (as Mia George)). Sohan Seenulal(Gokul) . Rony David(Franco). Gibin Gopinath(CCTV Mechanic). Anu Joseph(Councillor).Nithin Jake Joseph. Molly Kannamaly(Informer). MD Irfan KF(Nafri). Lishoy(William’s Father). Meenakshi Mahesh(Meenu). Aneesh Menon(Venture Employee). Shaji Nadesan(Joby (as Shaji Natesan)). Deepak Parambol(Shahul Hameed).Mahi Parasuraman. Kalabhavan Prachod(Venture Employee). Alexander Prasanth(Johnny). Nisthar Sait(Narayanan). Shaam(Samuel). Subeesh Sudhi(Prakashan). Sunil Sukhada(Maithreyan). Baiju V.K.(Waseem). Vijayakumar(Venture Employee). I.M. Vijayan(Anto)

Language Malayalam.

Producers Midhun Abraham. Arya. Dinesh S. Devan. Shaji Nadesan. Kilimanoor Sanu. Santosh Sivan. Prithviraj Sukumaran. Viswanath. Viswanath I.

Production August Cinema.
